```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(colorspace)
library(ggthemes)
library(patchwork)
```


```{r load_data}

# Filme von 1970 bis 2020, wenig Informationen pro Film
raw_bechdel <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/raw_bechdel.csv')
# Filme von 1970 bis 2013, viele Informationen, viele Informationen pro Film

movies <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2021/2021-03-09/movies.csv')
```

```{r}
hcl_palettes(type = "qualitative", plot = T, n = 9)
hcl_palettes("sequential (single-hue)", n = 7, plot = TRUE)
```


```{r}
movies %>% ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  as.numeric(intgross)) +
  geom_point() -> plot_1

movies %>% ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  as.numeric(domgross), group = year) +
  geom_boxplot() -> plot_2

library(patchwork)

(plot_1 + plot_2) / plot_2 +
  plot_annotation(title = "My work")
```





```{r}
movies %>% count(year, binary) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  n, color = binary) +
  geom_jitter() -> plot_1

movies %>% ggplot() +
  aes(x = year, y =  clean_test) +
  geom_jitter() -> plot_2

 plot_2 / plot_1
```
